DESCRIPTION: Cards with different name(except for upgrades) are considered unique.
Only activates when you play this card first time in the combat. Displays used up after one use.
Only activates for the first two times you play this card in combat. Displays as Once after one use.
Card containing #yFlower in its name. It can be upgraded 3 times, where 3rd upgrade is special.
Stands for Lesser Explosive Potion, which normally deals 6 damage to all enemies.
A "Lesser" version of regular potion which is always gained to your Sack.
A #yLesser #yPotion which deals 10 damage to an enemy.
A #yLesser #yPotion which applies 4 #yPoison to an enemy.
A #yLesser #yPotion which gains 8 Block when used.
A #yLesser #yPotion which applies 2 Weak to an enemy.
A #yLesser #yPotion which applies 2 Vulnerable to an enemy.
A #yLesser #yPotion which gives you 1 energy when used.
A #yLesser #yPotion which draws 2 cards when used.
Uncommon = Blue Banner NL Rare = Gold Banner
Boosts the effect of #yLight! and #yShadow.
#rAttack - Lesser Fire or Explosive Potion NL #gSkill - Lesser Block or Energy Potion NL #bPower - Lesser Strength or Dexterity Potion NL Other - Lesser Weak or Fear Potion
Choose 1 from Armaments, Havoc or Twin Strike. Feed is added to the list if upgraded.
Choose 1 from Choke, Well-Laid Plans or Poisoned Stab. Alchemize is added to the list if upgraded.
Choose 1 from Stack, Steam Barrier or All for one. Seek is added to the list if upgraded.
If you play multiple #yBomber #yForms, damage boost is stacked but you only get 1 #yLEP per turn. NL Also, bonus damage from #yBomber #yForm is not doubled by #yUpgrade #yBag.
3rd #yUpgrade makes this attack 3 times in addition to damage increase.
3rd #yUpgrade makes this cost 0 and heal for 3 instead of increasing damage.
3rd #yUpgrade makes this cost 0 instead of increasing #yBlock.
3rd #yUpgrade makes this cost 1 instead of increasing damage.
3rd #yUpgrade makes this cost 1 in addition to removing a debuff.
